titleStmt.title: A declaration and commission for three months assesment, of ten thousand pounds by the month beginning the 12th of April 1655, and ending the 12th of July following. April this 5. 1655. By the Lord Deputy and council. Ordered by the Lord Deputy and council, that this commission for the assesment, be forthwith printed and published. Tho: Herbert clerk of the council.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Council for the Affairs of Ireland.
